message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  $120 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now.  Would you consider $105?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $105. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $112.50. Let me know if that works for you!
